gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-34-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Launches to a black screen - Title appears appropriately.
title: Learn Japanese To Survive! Hiragana Battle

notes: Black screen, no audio, "app is not responding" pop-up.
title: Learn Japanese To Survive! Hiragana Battle

notes: Has to be ran with the index.html file found within /home/[username]/.steam/steam/steamapps/common/HiraganaBattle/www/index.html
title: Learn Japanese To Survive! Hiragana Battle

notes: The steam version of the game itself doesnt run, however there is an HTML version in "<path_to_game>/HiraganaBattle/www/index.html" that can be played in an internet browser. That version seems to be OS independent and works flawlessly, but I am giving the game a bronze since it is technically not the actual game.
title: Learn Japanese To Survive! Hiragana Battle
